title: Rae Carruth ////// 273
description:
Rae Carruth ////// 273

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Rae Carruth was blessed with every advantage one can think of. He used his speed to carry him all of the way to the National Football League. Drafted in the first round by the Carolina Panthers, Carruth was getting paid big bucks. However Rae is a brat who runs from his responsibilities and challenges. When his girlfriend refused to have an abortion, Rae set her up to be killed. This week we discuss convicted felon Rae Carruth. Beer of the Week - Runner by Truman’s Brewery Garage Grade - 3 and a half bottle caps out of 5
